description: Noting that India is a signatory to the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights, the non-profit press freedom organisation said it was incumbent upon the government to “uphold its international and domestic human rights obligations”.

title: MBA graduate snatches mobile phones in Dwarka to make quick buck, held
Bengaluru shocker: Nursing student frames cabbie for gang-rape to dodge boyfriend
description: A nursing student's gang-rape accusation against a cab driver near Bengaluru's Sir M Visvesvaraya Terminal has been debunked. Police found CCTV footage and WhatsApp chats suggesting a consensual encounter. The student reportedly fabricated the story to conceal scratch marks from her boyfriend, admitting to the false claim during questioning. The driver maintains his innocence.

Police have detained 35-year-old Ramsingh, a farmhand, who confessed to the heinous crime after kidnapping the child. The victim is stable and receiving treatment, while authorities are pursuing legal action.

Goa Police detained a partner and are seeking to impound the brothers' passports. A team is being sent to Thailand to bring them back, with authorities also investigating their finances.

Why has US revoked 85,000 visas of all categories?
description: The Trump administration has revoked 85,000 visas this year, a significant increase from last year, citing reasons like DUIs and assaults. This move is part of a broader crackdown on immigration, impacting various visa categories. Some visas were also revoked on account of celebration for Charlie Kirk's murder.

title: Sam Altman declares 'Code Red': OpenAI's real rival isn't Google; it's Apple
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has declared Apple its ultimate rival, issuing a 'code red' to refocus resources on ChatGPT's dominance.  He believes future AI success lies in devices, not just software, and is aggressively poaching Apple engineers for new AI hardware.  This strategic shift prioritizes mass-market appeal over AGI research.

title: Honest review: 'Visited Neeb Karoli Baba's Ashram only to realise it might not...'
description: I have visited Neeb Karoli Baba's ashram several times. The drive to the serene pilgrimage site was an experience in itself . Tucked away near a stream, the ashram which houses a temple offered a unique spiritual experience-quite an unforgettable one.

title: Ayesha Curry admits feeling anger when women try to pursue Stephen Curry
description: Ayesha Curry revealed on 'Red Table Talk' that she sometimes feels the urge to confront women who approach her husband, Stephen Curry, due to his naturally friendly demeanor. She later expressed regret about her appearance on the show, attributing the backlash to the platform's chaotic nature and the misinterpretation of her words.

title: Inside George Springer’s fairytale life with his wife Charlise Castro
description: Charlise Castro, a former Division I softball standout and America East Player of the Year, forged her own path beyond being George Springer's wife. After excelling in athletics, she pursued an MBA and built a credible career in wellness coaching, demonstrating ambition and resilience. Her journey highlights how partners of elite athletes can cultivate independent identities and success.

title: Phoebe raises $30M for Phia; Bill Gates jokes about customer-service shift
description: Bill Gates' daughter, Phoebe Gates, has secured $30 million in funding for her AI shopping startup, Phia, valuing the company at $180 million. While Bill Gates has not invested financially, he has contributed his time and experience, even working a customer service shift to support the venture.

title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias 2025 net worth: Career, music and business
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.
